title: LG Chem 3Q Net Profit Fell 60% on Year
text:
By Kwanwoo Jun

LG Chem Ltd.'s (051910.SE) third-quarter net profit plunged on year partly due to lower margins in its petrochemicals segment.

Net profit for the quarter ended September was 137.19 billion Korean won ($116.7 million) compared with KRW346.60 billion in the same quarter a year earlier, the South Korean company said Friday.

The latest results missed consensus forecasts for net profit of KRW213.92 billion, according to FactSet.

Revenue during the quarter rose 1.6% on year to KRW7.347 trillion.

Operating profit fell 37% on year to KRW380.27 billion.

LG Chem said it expects better earnings in the fourth quarter of the year thanks to some higher-margin petrochemicals and the turnaround from loss to profit in its battery-making segment.
